org.javasimon.clock

Class TestClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javasimon.clock.TestClock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimonClock

    public final class TestClock
extends Object
implements SimonClock
    TestClock allows setting any arbitrary values for millis and nanos. Available for non-test code too, if for nothing else then it's easier to use in tests in other modules too.
    Since:
    3.5
